reference_details.sea_guard_reaper_or_sky_sloop: Sky Sloop or Sea Guard Reaper

options.name: Scroll of the Pearl Throne
options.description:
Choose a Magic Item from an enemy unit that is in contact with the bearer. This Magic Item is ignored.

If it was an Enchanted Weapon or Shield, the mundane effects of the Weapon or Shield can still be used.

options.name: Daemon's Bane
options.description: +2 Arm against Magical Attacks.

options.name: Star Metal Alloy
options.description: +1 Arm, which is improved to +2 Arm for models without Mount. The bearer can never be wounded on a roll better than 3+.

options.name: Protection of Dorac
options.description: +3 Arm, +3 Def, and Attached. Arm can never be improved beyond 5.

options.name: Gleaming Robe
options.description: Aegis(3+). Armour is set to 1 and can never be improved beyond this. If the wearer Miscasts and rolls Witchfire, the number of hits is halved (rounding fractions up) for the wearer and its unit.

options.name: Elemental Blade
options.description: +1 Att, +1 Str. When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, choose to gain either Flaming Attacks, Lightning Attacks. The effects last until the end of the Round of Combat.

options.name: Navigator's Banner
options.description: The bearer's unit gains First Strike(Aegis(5+)).

options.name: Banner of Becalming
options.description: In each of the opponent's Magic Phases, immediately after Excess Magic  the opponent must discard 1 Magic Dice.

options.name: War Banner of Rymâ
options.description: A unit with one or more War Banners of Rymâ gains +1" Cha and Rank-and-File model parts with Elf in the bearer's unit gain Devastating Charge(+1 Str).

options.name: War Banner of Ryma
options.description: xx

options.name: Nova Flare
options.description:
Devastating Charge(+1 Att), Lethal Strike, Divine Attacks.

One use only. May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities in the Melee Phase. The wielder counts as Charging for the purpose of Devastating Charge.

options.name: Sliver of the Blazing Dawn
options.description: +1 Str and +2 AP. Each successful to-hit roll with this weapon causes two hits instead of one.

options.name: Cadaron's Heartwood
options.description: Shots 3, Str as user +1, and AP as user +1.

options.name: Book of Meladys
options.description: The first time in each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell cast with two or three Magic Dice, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice from this Casting Roll.

options.name: Diadem of Protection
options.description: Aegis(+2, max 4+).

options.name: Amethyst Crystal
options.description: Unless Shaken: Dispelling Rolls made by the bearer's army gain a +1 modifier. If the target of an enemy spell is within 18" of the bearer, the modifier is increased to +2.

options.name: Asfad Scholar
options.description: The model gains Channel(1). The Range of the Wizard's Learned Spells is increased by 6". Aura spells gain +3" Range instead, and spells with type Caster are unaffected.

options.name: Order of the Fiery Heart
options.description:
The model gains Flaming Attacks, Metal Armour, and the model part's Arm is set to 2.
The model replaces its available Paths of Magic with Alchemy, Pyromancy, and ignores the Missile, Damage spell types for Learned Spells when targeting units that are Engaged in Combat with the model.

options.name: Master of Canreig Tower
options.description:
The model gains Master of Spellcrafting, Protean Magic(3), Wizard Apprentice.

The model has these Paths of Magic available: Alchemy, Cosmology, Druidism, Evocation, Shamanism, Witchcraft.

options.name: High Warden of the Flame
options.description: The model gains Aegis(4+), Fearless, , Stubborn.

options.name: Fleet Officer
options.description:
The model gains Strider(Water), , , Resolute(1). The model part also gains Lightning Attacks and, if using a Longbow, Stand and Shoot.

Unless the model is Shaken, Panic Tests taken by friendly units containing Elf within 12" of this model are Minimised.

options.name: Grandmaster of the Sword
options.description: The model gains , Lethal Strike, First Strike(+1 Def, +1 Off), Sword Sworn.

options.name: Royal Huntsman
options.description: The model must take Great Weapon and cannot take Shield. The model gains Lion's Fur, Valiant, and the model part gains Multiple Wounds(2, towards Height 4--5).

options.name: Queen's Cavalier
options.description:
The model part gains First Strike(+1 Att, +1 Off) and the model's unit may reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

If the model has Height 5, Dragons (both Regal and Ancient) replace their Ancient Allies value with Ancient Allies(1), and Phoenixes replace it with Ancient Allies(2).

options.name: Queen's Companion
options.description:
The model's Longbow Shots are set to 3 and the model's unit gains Accurate.

Must choose (one option only):
•Fae Miasma, Scout,
Exclusive(Grey Watchers): free
•Moonlight Arrows: 10
